naslov: PREDIVNA KUĆA S VRTOM U SOLINU (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se predivna obiteljska kuća 307 m2 s pomoćnom zgradom 49 m2, dvorištem 250 m2, na odličnoj lokaciji u centru Solina, 80 m od dućana, ljekarne, samo 5 km od mora. Osobitoj ljepoti kuće pridonosi čaroban pogled na park, zelenilo te labudove na rijeci Jadro koja teče tik uz kuću. 2018. godine kuća je kompletno renovirana te ima ugrađene solare za toplu vodu. Kuća se sastoji od 3 etaže s 3 odvojena stana: visoko prizemlje, 1. kat i potkrovlje. Ispred kuće nalaze se 3 parkirna mjesta. Više detalja na upit. … BEAUTIFUL HOUSE WITH GARDEN IN SOLIN For sale: a beautiful family house of 307 m2 with a separate building of 49 m2, a yard of 250 m2, in an excellent location in the center of Solin, 80 m from shops, a pharmacy, only 5 km from the sea. The special beauty of the house is contributed by the magical view of the park, greenery and swans on the river Jadro, which flows right next to the house. In 2018, the house was completely renovated and has installed solar panels for hot water. The house consists of 3 floors with 3 separate apartments: upper ground floor, 1st floor and attic. There are 3 parking spaces in front of the house. More details on request.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Kneza Branimira 29, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
